Changelog
=========


1.6.1 (2010-09-06)
----------------
* #3139 Define apply_index method on portal_faceted in order to be used by
  faceted counter [voineali]

1.4 (2010-06-16)
----------------
* Run profile importVarious only in eea.faceted.tool context [voineali]


1.3 (2010-01-04)
----------------

* #2861 FIX: If there was a portal type mapping defined in portal_faceted only
  for object_provides or portal_type faceted search would return no results [voineali]


1.2 (2009-11-09)
----------------

* This package rely on plone.app.form. Added as dependency.


1.1 (2009-11-02)
----------------

* Safe import _eioRegistry in order to make it work with Plone 3.3.x.


1.0 (xxxx-xx-xx)
----------------

* Initial release
